summary: Argent Iron Armor converted for the UNPB body.
descriptionHtml:
A favorite of mine from back in Oblivion, I had randomly came across it a couple of days ago. I noticed that it wasn\'t converted for UNPB, so I decided to do it myself.

==============

This mod converts the Argent Iron Armor set to  the UNPB body with weight slider support. 
There are two different versions- the normal one which is grey and the black version. I made both versions separate files so you can choose.

If there are any issues, please let me know.

Please feel free to upload a picture of your character wearing the armor, whether it be
just to show off how much better your character is than mine or as a way to say \"thanks\"

==============

Requirements:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37900/?]UNPB[/url]




============

Credits

KURESE for the original armor
author: RoboNixon
